title: i cant move region?
body:
i cant move region
some one can help me?

replies.body: Those server transfers will still be turned off until about Nov 20. They wanted to make sure the end of season and blue essence stuff went over smoothly!

Hey there, Riot have made transfers unavailable while the season ends.
But don't worry, they will open it back up around about the 20th Nov, which is only 2 weeks away.
